name: Vasantrao Deshpande
description: '''Vasantrao Deshpande''' (2 May 1920 â€“ 30 July 1983) {{Pronunciation|Vasantrao_Deshpande.wav}} was a [[Hindustani classical]] vocalist renowned for his contribution to [[Natya Sangeet|Natyasangeet]]  (musical dramas).His play Katyar Kaljat Ghusli became very popular.
